suggestion.topic_name: Donald Trump's golf performance and praise
suggestion.rationale: These topics all focus on praising Trump's golf skills and discussing his overall performance, so merging them would streamline commentary on his athletic ability.

suggestion.topic_name: Donald Trump's golf achievements and technique
suggestion.rationale: Both topics address specific details of Trump's game—his birdies/eagles and his putting stroke—so they can be combined to consolidate detailed performance commentary.
Both topics capture general positive viewer responses and amazement at the video, making them semantically similar.
All three express anticipation or hype about the content, so merging them clarifies the excitement frame.
Both discuss views and subscriber metrics, so they can be combined under a single theme of channel growth.
Each topic proposes future high-profile collaborations, unifying all calls for guest appearances.

suggestion.topic_name: Sexual innuendos and jokes about Trump
suggestion.rationale: All three use double-entendre or innuendo regarding Trump being “inside” or holes, so they form a coherent humor category.
These topics uniformly express support, admiration, or endorsement of Trump, so merging them captures the supportive political frame.
Both cover dismissive or antagonistic online discourse and the concept of Trump Derangement Syndrome, making them suitable for consolidation.
Each topic involves viewer confusion or debate over the timing of the assassination attempt and its aftermath, so merging them clarifies that timeline frame.
Both focus on viewer reactions to Kamala Harris campaign advertising, so they form a single discussion topic.
Each expresses criticisms of Trump's image—age, fitness, and media portrayal—so merging them groups negative sentiments.
Both critique controversial aspects of the golf event (playing with convicted individuals and charity issues), so they can be combined under event controversies.
